name: V20 Hacker
description:
The game is simple..

You have to make your way through some jumbled puzzle to unlock the mainframe.

the game has 3 levels for now each with their own small puzzle. This game is great way for kids to understand English letters, so be sure to let them try it.

The game is created by SaturnswampGames..

   For any queries and things you can mail me

    E-mail : saturnswamp@gmail.com

And if you like the game you can donate of course and also support me on my various websites.

  I WILL SEE YOU GUYS AGAIN WITH NEW AND EXCITING GAMES.
